description: But it shouldn’t reinforce the notion that women alone should have to juggle the burden of work and caregiving. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: For dads, flexi-work is just what the doctor ordered
title_page: For dads, flexi-work is just what the doctor ordered | The Straits Times
maintext:
“Priorities.”
That word lingered in my mind long after I made my way home from a farewell dinner for a colleague at the law firm where I worked. It was around two years ago, and my wife was pregnant at the time.
